      public static short serialVersionUID

  • Constructor Details

    • Wall

      public Wall​(int x, int y, Image_Library lib, Map m, int type)
      Constructor of the Wall Class

      This creates a new wall at the given position (x,y) on the Map m It then sets the type of the new wall 1 - Not Destroyable 2- Destroyable

      Parameters:
      x - Position on the x axis of the map
      y - Position on the y axis of the map
      lib - The library where Image changes are to be flagged
      m - The map where the game is being played
      type - The type of the wall to be placed

  • Method Details

    • Destroy

      public void Destroy()
      Destroys this wall removing it from the map and placing rubble instead
